title: The default value set in list box of report parameter is lost after modifying the default value
description: The default value set in list box of report parameter is lost after modifying the default value.
OB: No default value is set in the list box of the report parameter.
EB: The default value 'aaa' should be set in the list box of the report parameter after modifying the default value.
SR:
1. Open the report parameter settings.
2. Set the default value to 'aaa'.
3. Modify the default value to 'bbb'.
4. Change the display type to Combo Box.
5. Verify that the default value in the combo box is 'aaa'.
6. Click the OK button.
Expected result: The default value 'aaa' should be set in the combo box and the OK button should be grayed out.
